content: Finite By Design DIY bearer bars:LOT 1: 2015 Bitcoin bar #45, gold finish alloyLOT 2: 2015 Ethereum Frontier bar #42, copper finish alloyLOT 3: 2015 Ethereum Frontier bar #42, silver finish alloyLOT 4: 2015 Ethereum Frontier bar #42, gold finish alloyLOT 5: 2017 Dash bar #20, silver finish alloy**Each bar comes with COA + hologram(s)****Pictures courtesy of Finite by Design: https://finitebydesign.net/image-gallery/**STARTING BID PER LOT: 0.0030BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: NOVEMBER 9th, 2023, 14:00:00 PST**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: bc1qxsynpetjqzcftk828k6u77khy3nf528nqs8qtsSHIPPING: Based on location and preferenceOWNER: NOT DISCLOSED
